title: Robotics industry reacts to iRobot’s bankruptcy
description:
iRobot’s Chapter 11 bankruptcy has sparked intense reactions across the robotics industry, with opinions on the roles of regulation, innovation speed, manufacturing scale, and global competition.

The post Robotics industry reacts to iRobot’s bankruptcy appeared first on The Robot Report.
